title: Buggy Collision Avoidance
detail: This is a proof of concept for using automotive ultrasonic sensors to detect curbs and other buggies
extended_details: Ultrasonics have been growing in popularity in the automotive industry for use in driver assistance tools (i.e. blind-spot car detection, parallel parking assistance).  Ultrasonics have a reputation for being noisy and difficult, but we believe that automotive ultrasonics could be utilized for obstacle detection on buggies due to their low cost and high durability.

parts_and_costs.part: Small Form Factor Evaluation Module for Ultrasonic Sens
PGA450Q1EVM - Ultrasonic IC Sensor Signal Conditioner E
